title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 15.10 - Right to audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 15.10 - Right to audit

State Regulations

The commissioner of finance or his/her duly authorized
representative shall have the right to audit the accuracy of the payments, distributions and remittances made to him/her pursuant to this agreement, and
amounts retained therefrom, upon his/her request, but not more than once in
each calendar year at a time agreed upon by the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles
and the State Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
15.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
